alert.note: Alert for Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Laurens, southeastern Greenville, central Spartanburg and northwestern Union Counties through 300 AM EDT... At 215 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Spartanburg, or 4 miles southeast of Reidville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Woodruff, Duncan, Pacolet, Roebuck, Pacolet Mills, Reidville, Croft State Park, Moore and Cedar Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg; Union
